Articles.Content: Hi guys (and girls)! I was thinking i should install BDarmory, and i tried it with the help of some youtube tutorials but it didn't work. So anyone who is good with these, maybe have some tips (or maybe a whole written tutorial or some up to date youtube video on installing mods and such)? Thanks in advance for your help.

16 hours ago, kspguy77 said:

Hi guys (and girls)! I was thinking i should install BDarmory, and i tried it with the help of some youtube tutorials but it didn't work. So anyone who is good with these, maybe have some tips (or maybe a whole written tutorial or some up to date youtube video on installing mods and such)? Thanks in advance for your help.

Read the first post in the following thread ... it explains how to install BD Armory Continued (same as any other mod)

Basically download the mod from Spacedock or its repository and copy the contents of the GameData directory into your KSP directory ... but first read the first post in each of the mod threads of the mods you want to install, it will save you a whole lot of time and headaches
